why is it that all these parodies of this anime are all drawn so sloppy and unsexily? like its obvious somone took a good amount of time to produce so why make all the lines so scratchy and ugly? makes it hard to see whats actually going on and it really just ruines the mood, normaly this wouldnt bother me but this version is even drawn in a different style than most of the other ones but its still so sloppy and hectic looking. its kind of a boner killer to be honest. idk maybe its just me
